mapper.select: SELECT c.*, t1.from_user_name, t1.from_user_head, t2.to_user_name FROM COMMENT c, ( SELECT c.id, u.username from_user_name, u.head_url from_user_head FROM COMMENT c LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON c.from_user_id = u.user_id ) t1, ( SELECT c.id, u.username to_user_name FROM COMMENT c LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON c.to_user_id = u.user_id ) t2 WHERE t1.id = c.id AND t2.id = c.id AND (replay_type = 2 or replay_type = 3) AND belong = #{belong} AND (status = 1 or status = 2) order by c.create_time

SELECT c.*, t1.from_user_name, t1.from_user_head, t2.to_user_name FROM COMMENT c, ( SELECT c.id, u.username from_user_name, u.head_url from_user_head FROM COMMENT c LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON c.from_user_id = u.user_id ) t1, ( SELECT c.id, u.username to_user_name FROM COMMENT c LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON c.to_user_id = u.user_id ) t2 WHERE t1.id = c.id AND t2.id = c.id AND c.replay_type = #{replayType} AND c.belong = #{belong} AND (status = 1 or status = 2) order by c.create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into comment (from_user_id, to_user_id, content, like_count, replay_type, belong, to_comment, create_time, status) values (#{fromUserId}, #{toUserId}, #{content}, #{likeCount}, #{replayType}, #{belong}, #{toComment}, #{createTime},#{status})
mapper.update: update comment set content=#{content},status=#{status} where id=#{id}
